item.title: Docker Auto Discovery with Traefik
item.description: Introduction When running containers directly with docker, one has to bear up with ports and networking directly. Actual environments make use of API Gateways, enabling API versioning and other standard features. One cannot achieve this out of the box with docker, but one may think of spinning a nginx/envoy proxy and configuring it to achieve the same feel. But that sounds like quite an overhead as one has to manually update configs for every new container being launched.
